title.rendered: M&D Academy of Wonder + Perry Store Opening + James Patterson

content.rendered:
Attend the Melissa & Doug Academy of Wonder

Come join us today for a special, interactive experience sure to launch kids’ imaginations and provide parents with new perspectives on the power of play!

We’re transforming our Warner Robins store into an Academy of Wonder, where kids ages 3+ become official Melissa & Doug Academy of Wonder students for the day, using the power of their imaginations to become play experts and even earn a diploma! Plus, they will go home with Inspiration Kits full of ideas and activities to keep the fun going! (supplies are limited)

Melissa & Doug believes that toys should be a launch pad for imagination and wonder. We are so excited to join them on their mission to “Take Back Childhood” and give kids more unstructured time and space to imagine, create, explore, and think!

See you there!

Perry Store Has Re-Opened

We are finished ahead of schedule! The store now features an open concept and plenty more space for books and toys. Stop by this week for a first look at the newly designed interior.

Author Spotlight: James Patterson

James Patterson is one of our best sellers here at Gottwals Books. From his Alex Cross series to the Woman’s Murder Club, he always keep us on our toes waiting for what he will come out with next. We carry his fiction titles, new releases, young adult, teen, and bookshots! Stop by one of our stores to find something for everyone in the family.
